overview: Joe Delgado is a Managing Director in the New York office of CCMP Capital. Mr. Delgado focuses on making investments in the industrial and energy sectors and has been responsible for CCMP’s investments in ARAMARK Corporation, Convermex, Edwards Limited, Hispanic Teleservices Corporation and Mercado Libre. Prior to joining CCMP in 2001, Mr. Delgado was with J.P. Morgan Capital for three years. Previously, he worked in the Latin America Mergers & Acquisitions group and the Structured Finance group at J.P. Morgan & Co. Mr. Delgado holds a B.A. from Duke University. He currently serves on the board of directors of Edwards Limited and San Luis Rassini Brakes.
